productDescription: The ultimate aero road bike. Aerodynamics meets lightweight construction for maximum performance on the road.
Lightweight climbing road bike for mountain riders. Carbon frame with perfect balance of stiffness and comfort.
Long-distance road bike for comfort on extended tours. Endurance geometry for relaxed riding.
Triathlon and time trial bike. UCI-compliant with integrated hydration system and optimal aerodynamics.
Premium gravel bike for off-road adventures. Versatile for gravel forest trails and tarmac.
Bikepacking-optimized gravel bike with numerous mounting points for long tours.
Trail mountain bike with 125mm travel. Perfect for flowy trails and technical passages.
Enduro race bike with Shapeshifter technology. World Cup tested for aggressive descents.
Freeride mountain bike for parks and extreme trails. 180mm travel for maximum fun.
XC race bike for competitions. Ultra-light and stiff for maximum efficiency on the racecourse.
All-mountain bike with 130mm travel. Versatile for uphills and downhills.
Fitness bike for city and touring. Light and fast with upright riding position.
Urban commuter bike for the daily ride to work. Fenders and lights included.
Premium e-bike for urban mobility. Fazua motor for a natural riding feel.
E-MTB for trail riders. Shimano EP8 motor for powerful uphill assistance.
E-road bike for long tours. Discreet motor for natural pedal assistance.
Trekking e-bike for touring and everyday use. Bosch motor with long range.
Kids mountain bike with 20-inch wheels. Light and sturdy for young riders.
Kids mountain bike with 24-inch wheels. Perfect for young teenagers.
Hardtail XC bike for efficient riding. Light and direct for race use.
Aerodynamic road helmet with MIPS technology. Wind tunnel optimized.
Trail helmet with extended rear head protection. Lightweight and well-ventilated.
Premium bib shorts with chamois padding. Compression and comfort for long rides.
Aerodynamic short-sleeve jersey. Breathable and quick-drying.
Wind-resistant winter jacket for cold days. Thermoregulating and water-repellent.
Full-finger gloves for gravel adventures. Padding and grip.
Lightweight carbon wheelset for road bikes. Aerodynamic and stiff.
Ergonomic performance saddle. Carbon shell with pressure relief.
Water bottle with squeeze cap. BPA-free and dishwasher safe.
Complete bikepacking bag set. Handlebar frame and saddle bag.
